content.value:
To anyone who has ever made fun of me for wearing socks during sex, it’s SCIENCE 🧦

“Put on socks, have warmer feet, and have easier orgasms” @emilynagoski
content.html: To anyone who has ever made fun of me for wearing socks during sex, it’s SCIENCE 🧦 “Put on socks, have warmer feet, and have easier orgasms” @emilynagoski

photo.alt: An excerpt from the book Come As You Are by Emily Nagoski. This page describes a study by Gert Holstege that found when “putting on socks made it easier for research participants to orgasm while masturbating in a brain imaging machine.” he described that without socks, the research participants were “uncomfortable and had cold feet.”
